text: A siddur () is a Jewish prayer book. It has a set order of a list of Jewish prayers and blessings.Siddur in The Free Dictionary. "Siddurs", which come from a Hebrew root meaning "order",The word "seder", referring to the ritual Passover meal, comes from the same root. have a very long history and so they can be found in a number of versions in different streams in Judaism. ==References== ==Other websites== * Siddur Audio Category:Jewish literature
title: Siddur
